mapper.insert: insert into sys_msg (content, `type`, send_by, send_to, send_time) values (#{content}, #{type}, #{sendBy}, #{sendTo}, current_timestamp())
mapper.select: select send_by,count(*) as content from sys_msg where send_to = #{userId} and `read` = '0' GROUP BY send_by
mapper.update: update sys_msg set `read` = '1' where send_by = #{sendBy} and send_to = #{sendTo}
